title: The Jboy Show - Why LSU is a better job than USC plus Lane Kiffin Joins the show
itunes:title: The Jboy Show - Why LSU is a better job than USC plus Lane Kiffin Joins the show
description:
Jake breaks down why LSU is a way better job than USC (12:00) plus Lane Kiffin stops by the show to discuss Saban's recruitment of Arch Manning and his recent dust-up with Michael Wilbon (45:00). Make sure to check us out LIVE on Youtube every day at 3pm EST, plus follow us @thejboyshow on all social media platforms.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
